localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Mentioned.app is a simple analytics tool that lets you track your website mentions in real-time. Receive an email notification every time your website is mentioned. Track site visits from each link and measure value. Best part? It's Free.
nodes.title: Mentioned - Get an email when your website is posted online.
nodes.author: Daniel Rongo

nodes.excerpt: Personal journal app for everyone where you can get connected with others! Goodnight Journal is the only personal journal app that offers modern design that works the same on any device, with the community, chat and features to boost your mental health.
nodes.title: Goodnight Journal 2.0 - Facebook for journaling

nodes.excerpt: A live dashboard of how the COVID-19 vaccine is being administered across the globe.

nodes.excerpt: DoYouNotes helps students memorize their notes faster. How? 1. upload a PDF file 2. mark the sections to study 3. review the sections (recall/show/hide content, spaced repetition, order by urgency/randomly, self-evaluate) 4. check your progress
nodes.title: DoYouNotes - Memorize your notes faster
nodes.author: Massimo Cairo

nodes.excerpt: Findnlink is a platform where you can share your projects and find co-founders/members. - Customize your project page - Create your own portfolio / profile - Show your skills We want to make Findnlink a great virtual workspace to connect teams together ğŸ‘Œ

nodes.excerpt: Daily-curated Remote Jobs for Everyone Features: - simple list (Hacker News style) - simple & fast search powered by Algolia - only the latest jobs from the last 30 days - no long descriptions, just simple titles and links - no ads - simple email newsletter
nodes.title: Remotelane 3.0 - Remote jobs for everyone with the most simple ux and search

nodes.excerpt: "Every day, it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day, that's the hard part". Everyday helps you break goals down into tasks we can execute on every day, colouring our beautiful board whilst forming new habits, ultimately reaching our goals.
nodes.title: Everyday 2.0 - Simple & beautiful habit tracker for the Web, iOS & Android

nodes.excerpt: Write in Notion, publish to the web. Add custom domain, analytics, themes and more.
nodes.title: Notelet - Create a website or blog with Notion.

nodes.excerpt: Meteostat is a meteorological database which provides historical weather and climate data for thousands of weather stations and places worldwide. The project features a convenient web app and data interfaces for developers.
nodes.title: Meteostat - Historical weather and climate data

nodes.excerpt: Hacker News Front Page Explorer is a database of Ranked Hacker News Front Page posts. Some Example Use Cases:- - find ways to rank your post on the Front Page - discover top trends in HN Community. - build an App using this data
nodes.title: Hacker News Front Page Explorer - A database of top ranking Hacker News front page posts

nodes.title: Placement - Fly through your job search with magic tools & expert advice

nodes.excerpt: Podpage makes it easy to create a podcast website with just a few clicks. Every page is optimized to be found on Google and stays up-to-date forever. No technical knowledge necessary.
nodes.title: Podpage - Build a podcast website in less than 5 minutes.

nodes.excerpt: Look Back On Your Year Our guided annual review helps bring perspective and closure to the past year before you dive into the year ahead.

nodes.excerpt: Scanly aims to help small businesses fight the pandemic. Free, fast, simple and user-friendly digital menus with QR codes should make business safer and increase sales by 20-40%.
nodes.title: Scanly - Free contactless digital menus management

nodes.excerpt: Choose a channel and let your mind wander with the continuous stream of videos we handpicked from the best YouTube creators. Relax with the natural images and sounds while you work, put on your TV or invite your friends to watch together.
nodes.title: Escapista - Curated videos to relax and explore the world from home.

nodes.title: Crowdfunded - A database of 2,000+ crowdfunding campaigns

nodes.excerpt: Stop spending a lot of time searching templates for documents in multiple sectors including IT, Business, HR, Legal, Medicine, Education, and Finance. Use Fastdok to generate ready-to-use documents that work in minutes by answering a few questions.

nodes.excerpt: Momento provide a powerful tool to help you manage your domains and SSL certificates to prevent you from forgetting. With Momento you can renew your domains, manage your DNS and buy new domains from all your registrars. Everything in one place.
nodes.title: Momento - A powerful platform to help you manage your domains
nodes.author: Luca Rossi

nodes.excerpt: Fuel fund showcases selected startups to 1000s of handpicked investors in the US. Think of it as a fund's demo day but asynchronous and massively scalable. When a startup lists on wantfuel.com, we forward their details to almost 5000+ investors on our rolodex.
nodes.title: Fuel Fund - List your startup and get discovered by 1000s of investors
nodes.author: Sid

nodes.excerpt: MyWebAR is the easiest way to build cross-platform augmented reality instantly available in a browser. Whether you are a professional developer or have no prior experience, we have the set of tools that will allow you to get started in the matter of minutes.
nodes.title: MyWebAR 2.0 - The easiest way to create webAR

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Accountable 2.0 - the all new way to become HIPAA compliant. Designed to simplify the entire process of achieving and managing HIPAA compliance, from HIPAA training to policy management. And did we mention $100k HIPAA breach guarantee?
nodes.title: Accountable 2.0 - HIPAA compliance management platform and $100k guarantee

nodes.excerpt: The best way to help save local businesses is getting more people in the door. Delight is the simplest way to tell a friend about a business. - Find your favorite spot, send the link to a friend and we'll donate money to that business when they check it out.
nodes.title: Delight - Support local businesses by referring friends
nodes.author: Dan Giaime

nodes.excerpt: Chocolate is sweet but SaaS surprises are sweeter - and we have two a day! At the stroke of midnight SaaS Advent Calendar unlocks an exclusive deal from well-established SaaS companies as well as a free SaaS in beta that needs valuable feedback.
nodes.title: SaaS Advent Calendar 2020 - SaaSanta is coming to town and he's not bringing coal
